name: volt-absorb

effect.sun-moon: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
